title: Hypermedia-Based Worked Example Learning: Schema Acquisition Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers. A blended environment combining digital devices and project-based learning for elementary teachers to strengthen language curriculum design capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can perform comparative analysis between task examples with 85% accuracy in a hypermedia environment.
Learners can apply language learning schemas to three or more project deliverables using digital comparison tools.
Learners achieve 70+ points (out of 100) on proximal assessment tasks by utilizing acquired schemas.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
